v0.1.0, date 17/03/2013 -- Initial release
v0.1.2, date 26/03/2013 -- Efficient C++ RankUpdator and MinGapUpdator, MinMaxUpdator out
v0.1.3, date 28/03/2013 -- OverlappingIntervalsUpdator implemented, minor documentation bugfixes
v0.1.3.5, date 30/03/2013 -- OverlappingIntervalsUpdator: more regression tests + performance improvements +  performance comparison tests
